pages.text: Aur iss say pehlay tumharay pass (hazrat) yousuf daleelen ley ker aaye phir bhi tum inn ki laaee hui (daleel) mein shak-o-shuba hi kertay rahey yahan tak kay jab unki wafaat hogaee to kehney lagay inn kay baad to Allah kissi rasool ko bhejay ga hi nahi issi tarah Allah gumrah kerta hai her uss shaks ko jo hadd say barh janey wala shak-o-shuba kerney wala ho

Jo baghair kissi sanad kay jo inn kay pass aaee ho Allah ki aayaton mein jhagartay hain Allah kay nazdeek aur momino kay nazdeek yeh to boht bari narazgi ki cheez hai Allah Taalaa issi tarah her aik maghroor sirkash kay dil per mohar ker deta hai
Firaon ney kaha aey haamaan! Meray liye aik bala khana bana shayad kay mein jo aasman kay darwazay hain

(unn) darwazon tak phonch jaon aur musa kay mabood ko jhaank loon aur be-shak mein samjhta hun woh jhoota hai aur issi tarah firaon ki bad-kirdariyan ussay bhali dikhaee gaeen aur raah say rok diya gaya aur firaon ki (her) heela saazi tabahee mein hi rahee
Aur uss momin shaks ney kaha kay aey meri qom! (kay logo) tum (sab) meri perwi kero mein nek raah ki taraf tumhari rehbari keroon ga
Aey meri qom! Yeh hayat-e-duniya matay-e-faani hai (yaqeen mano kay qarar) aur hameshgi ka ghar to aakhirat hi hai

Jiss ney gunah kiya hai ussay to barabar barabar ka badla hi hai aur jiss ney neki ki hai khua woh mard ho ya aurat aur woh eman wala ho to yeh log jannat mein jayen gay aur wahan be-shumar rozi payen gay
